history.proof: intros A p H m. induction p using prechain_ind. - hauto use: chain_concat_s unfold: prechain_last, pre_domok_incr_chain_def inv: prechain_incr, prechain_dom_ok. - qauto use: chain_concat_m, pre_domok_incr_chain_0 unfold: pre_domok_incr_chain_def, prechain_last inv: prechain_incr, prechain_dom_ok.

original: intros A p H m. induction p using prechain_ind. - simpl. apply domok_single. - simpl. apply domok_concat. + apply IHp. + apply H.
